title: Economic Indicators Fall Further
content: Consumers continue to express concern about the future health of the economy.

title: With Outlook Uncertain, the Bank of England Joins the US Fed in Putting Interest Rates on Hold
content: The Bank of England has kept its main U.K. interest rate unchanged at 4.50% even though the economy is barely growing and the nation faces more uncertainty in light of the tariff policies being enacted by the Trump administration in the U.S. The decision by the nine-member Monetary Policy Committee on Thursday was widely expected, and comes a day after the U.S. Federal Reserve also kept interest rates unchanged

title: Stock Market Today: Wall Street Edges Lower Despite Solid Data on the Economy
content: U.S. stock indexes edged lower following another reminder that big, unsettling policy changes are underway because of President Donald Trump, along with more signals suggesting the U.S. economy remains solid for now

title: Fed: Slow Growth, More Inflation Ahead
content: The forecast reflects uncertainty over the impact of President Donald Trump’s economic agenda.

title: Stock Market Today: Wall Street Rallies as Pressure Eases From the Bond Market After Fed Decision
content: U.S. stocks climbed after the Federal Reserve said the economy still looks healthy enough to keep interest rates where they are

title: Stock Market Today: Wall Street Rises Ahead of Fed Announcement
content: U.S. stock indexes are rising as Wall Street waits to hear what the Federal Reserve will say about where interest rates may be heading

title: Federal Reserve Sees Tariffs Raising Inflation This Year, Keeps Key Rate Unchanged
content: The Federal Reserve kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged Wednesday and signaled that it still expects to cut rates twice this year, though more policymakers forecast fewer cuts

title: Stock Market Today: Back Down Goes Wall Street as Big Tech Resumes Its Slide
content: Wall Street swung back down, and its former superstars once again led the way

title: Trump’s Tariffs Hang Over Economy
content: Uncertainty over the timing and effects of President Donald Trump’s tariffs are weighing on the economy and markets.
